long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Papaya CookieMonster extension is designed to simplify your browsing experience by automatically executing cookie preferences on your behalf on hundreds of different websites! With a focus on privacy and convenience, this extension allows you to set your preferences for marketing and performance cookies, ensuring a seamless and personalized browsing experience.

Key Features:

Automatic Cookie Management: Automatically executes cookie consent banners based on your predefined preferences, saving you time and effort on every website visit.

Local Preference Storage: Your preferences for marketing and performance cookies are securely stored on device, ensuring your privacy is maintained.

Simple and Intuitive UI: Easily set and update your cookie preferences through a user-friendly interface.

Future Payback Integration: While the "Login to Payback" feature is currently under development, future updates will allow you to monetize your browsing data if you choose to opt-in.

How It Works:

Set Your Preferences: Open the extension popup and set your preferences for marketing and performance cookies.

Automatic Application: The extension will automatically apply your preferences to cookie consent banners as you browse the web.

Stay Updated: Keep the extension up-to-date to benefit from future features and improvements, including the upcoming Payback integration.

Why Choose Papaya CookieMonster?

Enhanced Privacy: Take control of your cookie preferences and ensure your data is handled according to your wishes.

Convenience: Save time by automating the tedious task of managing cookie consents on every website.

Monetization: Stay tuned for upcoming features that will provide even more control and options for your data privacy and monetization.

Get Started Today:

Install Papaya CookieMonster now and take the first step towards a more streamlined and privacy-focused browsing experience.
